page.title: 05ALLET NURSERIES, NEAR TRURO.
page.content: Mr.&Mrs.E.own 6 acres of land,of which almost 2 acres consist of glasshouses & polythene tunnelling used for the production of salad foods.They work 16 hours every day,employ 3 full-time & 2 part-time workers,& produce 1000 dozen lettuce per week, as well as tomatoes, cucumbers & peppers. Lettuce only is to be grown in the future to increase efficiency & combat rising costs of fuel & chemicals, which are used to sterilise the soil; although following excessive use of chemicals in Holland, E.E.C. regulations may mean that more expensive steam sterilisation must be used. Mouse-damage is the biggest pest problem, effectively controlled by 6 cats.Lettuce are sold by reputation of quality & reliability; no supply contracts are held; they sell locally, transport costs being too high when there is no guaranteed minimum return.
